name: World Of Leaders
description: Become one of today's world leaders and change the world order!WARNING: Our special 80% discount is limited only to the 10,000 first players! Do not wait!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or AMD with 512 Mb ram Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Just don't. Even if this game were free getting it is a terrible idea.   Pros -Cool concept  Cons -Grammatical errors throughout -Looks like something straight out of the 90s -Events for individual cities are limited and incorrect -Crashes often -Those grammatical errors could quite possibly be killing me.  This is obviously a low-budget game and is not worth the money. With that being said, if the devs update to fix errors and add things it may change my mind.
sucks, really slow paced, doesnt really work  money scam
I lost 6 minutes of my life, i want them back.
really interesting and promising game,its a baby yet.i wonder what will hapen if more ppl comes to every country.
this game blows not even worth the time to make a full review
Poorly programmed, spelling and grammatical errors throughout text, voiceovers are horrifying. Do not recommend. This game is bad, and you should feel bad.
